评论详情: Fits true to size. Soft and comfy! I love it! Quality is great!! I want more to wear for working out as well as casual wear & also to work.
This shirt is perfect in every way - nice, thick material; sewn well; flattering cut; rich colors that wash well. I’ve bought in 4 colors! Great as a layering piece or on its own.
Love the color and the fact that the sleeves are so long but unfortunately, for me the shirt was too short. I'm 5'11, for people with shorter torso, I would recommened.

The shirt seems very well made. A lot of times plain shirts like this are made with really flimsy material. This shirt is made of a thicker material which I love because it helps keep me nice and warm in the winter. I actually ordered one first and then I ordered 2 more so far in different colors. I have the off white, baby blue and hot pink. I will probably order a couple more They also fit true to size and they have the little thumb slot on the sleeve. I don't use that part but it isn't very noticable so that wasn't an issue for me.

Perfect, basic, stretch fit top.  Has the quality, thickness, and movement I've been looking for.  It does run true to size, and would be nice if they had more sizes, just happy the XL fit perfect!!!

评论概述: Great price for a quick Christmas gift

For the price, the thickness of the material is great.  I returned it because I was not satisfied with how it fit me (I am a 38 ddd for reference) and the color was not flattering.  I think the top is a good value for the money as long as the fit works for you.  I also do not find the finger loops comfortable.
The color and fabric is nice but the sleeves are a little shorter than normal.
Great shirt but way too short.
The shirt fit and feels great, but it came with a hole on the side seam.  It looks amazing with wide-leg jeans and/or joggers.
This top is stretchy and very thick! Love the soft material!
Love these tops, very comfy
awesome

It is thick as other reviewers mentioned. The arms are really long. I wanted to dress this up but the arms went way past my hands. Exactly how it is pictured. I’m 5’2” and anverage. Ordered a large. Not sure a medium would have made a difference as far as anrm length. Also, thumb holes. Love the color. That’s about it.

评论概述: runs a bit small, heavier weighted fabric than picture
评论详情: This shirt is ok, sleeves run short, fabric is much thicker in real life than appears in the picture on Amazon. Had I tried this on in a store I wouldn't have bought it.
Material is so so soft and fits beautifully ❤️
Love this long sleeve T-shirt. Very comfortable and great feet.  I ordered another one in white.
Fit 👌 and quality,  and comfortable 👌 value for money 👍

评论概述: Thumb hole is in the wrong place!

So the color is spot on and it is a little on the heavier, thicker side. I was hoping maybe for a lighter more ribbed, but it definitely is stretchy and at the same time fitting around the arms so it’s not loose which I love &very warm.
This top is tight, but not uncomfortable. It's really warm too! I love the cut and it looks great on!

评论概述: Nice quality, Great colors. Size up!
评论详情: Too tight in chest. I'm size 6, 5'5" about 125 lbs and 38B bra. Originally ordered brown and red size medium to layer under vests, sweater, and coats this winter. No way! Sending back for Large. Size up 1.

I purchased this item to wear with some slacks purchased a few weeks ago on vacation . The top arrived and it fit perrfectly with the material and color of the pants. The top was cozy and warm enough to wear out on an evening for outside dining. I definitely would recommend this item for anyone to purchase.
Not at all loose fitting. Size up one size
I love the softness and it doesn’t stretch out!  Fits me great!

The stretch and softness is great. It is a true size and not a cropped shirt. Great layering piece or wear as a stand alone. Nice true black basic to add to you wardrobe. Washes very well, as we have often. My daughter wear these under her work uniform in the cooler months. Its a great quality and material. We love the slight stretch giving it a softer feel and more longevity.

I love these BTFBM sweaters! I am a 36B and weigh 131 lbs. Size Med fits me perfect. I’ve washed them several times, yes i got 4 colors, the dark brown is my favorite color. I hang to dry. The colors have not faded, army green, and pumpkin colors. They have not lost their shape. Comfortable, not heavy, warm, i wear as under shirt for scrubs. Great price too!
These are amazing quality and so soft. I bought several.

For reference I am 5’ 4” and 120 lbs, I am wearing a small (in the dark army green color).  I really love this top all around! The fabric is very soft and comfy, a bit thicker so perfect for the cooler months. I think it’s very flattering, form fitting but not skin tight. The length is perfect, it’s not cropped but not too long, just right! This really is the perfect basic top that can be paired with just about anything. I have another color on the way and will most likely be ordering more! :)
A must have for travel
Warm, thick, comfortable and fit perfectly.

I absolutely love these shirts, they are thick but soft and feel super good quality. They taper in at the waist for a snatched look but are loose enough to be completely comfortable for all day wear. I would buy every color. True to size.
I absolutely love this shirt so much that I ordered in many colors. Great quality and comfort.
Runs small and short

Bought these to wear under my polo for work and they are great! I got a large so that the arms would be long enough and it’s perfect. Keeps me warm too. Can be worn alone as well….not see through. For reference I’m a small/medium in tops typically but the large works best for me for this style. 5’7 145-150lbs bra size 34D.
These are soft but run small. They are not super long — but perfect for  wearing under hoodies and sweaters for extra layers.
They are not stretchy/spandex material, but still a great material! I have them in two colors
Really nice cozy shirt that stretches just enough to be comfortable. Material is soft and definitely feels and looks like a much higher end piece of clothing. Highly recommend!
Color true to picture. Soft material.  Nice weight, appears made well.  I haven’t tried it on yet, seems that it will be form fitting.

I purchased this for an underwater with winter approaching as I’m often cold. I like the thumb whole and length of sleeves. I’m 5’ 2”, 100 pounds for reference and orders a size small. I’d say i could have sized up to a medium. The material is thicker than a tshirt material but not as thick as a sweatshirt. The shirt hits just above the hips.
This shirt if comfortable, cleans easily, and looks attractive.
Great quality shirt, runs large I would recommend sizing down

I been on a hunt for full length basic tops so I gave this a try during prime day. Received my package today & I am extremely happy with my items. Shirt fits flattering in my chest & mid section. Enough stretch & thickness. It fits full length (no crop top). Sleeves fit really long but I don’t mind that. Really impressed.

I bought this to wear in Colorado under a flannel shift to keep this Floridian warm this fall.  I love the feel, weight, length of sleeves and fit. It said fit and it is. Perfect. I don’t think the fabric is thin at all, I bought the white.  I was surprised to see that.  Stretches nicely over my big bust.  Planning on buying another color.  Very cozy. Perfect for under a shirt or sweater.

Great shirt, warm and a bit heavier. The brown color is nice and rich. And I love the sleeves.

Way nicer than expected!! The material is thicker than anticipated and I wouldn't hesitate to buy more of this top in other colors! Definitely a great staple item for your wardrobe. Cannot imagine anybody would be unhappy with this shirt...  Love love love the pink!! Very happy here!
This shirt is nice and thick. It’s very good quality and looks just as pictured. When I need some more long sleeves for the colder weather I’ll be getting more here.

This top is the perfect weight material when fall season arrives.  Super soft material with a good amount of stretch to fit every curve on your body.  Very comfortable to wear…..casually with a pair of jeans or add a blazer, and it is perfect for work.  Very versatile top.  True to size and I highly recommend.
Love how stretchy this is and it clings it a flattering way.

I’ve been looking for a soft material long sleeve rather than the spandex type and I’m so incredibly happy with this one. I ordered it in white and black. The white is not see-through and the perfect thickness. It will definitely become a staple in my winter wardrobe.
Love this this color and the size is perfect for my wife.

I’m super surprised by how soft and comfortable this shirt is! I personally love the little thumbholes as this seems more like a fall/winter weight shirt and my hands are always freezing lol - I got a M and it fits perfectly, will def buy more colors
Way too small

评论概述: Thicker material than most.  Very pleased
评论详情: I’ve purchased a few of the long sleeved BTFBM tees for Fall/Winter wardrobe.  They are a much better fabric quality than most and feel warm.  The thickness is good enough to hide imperfections unlike many of the too thin, too stretchy tees.  True to size.  I’m 5’5”, 140lbs and over 60.  The M was perfect.
Very confortable and soft fabric. If you’re pretty tall like me, shirt length is short, but arm length is good. Okay to wear with high waisted pants.
Perfect color , fit , comfortable, nice quality , awesome price !!! Bought one in every color perfect for fall and for layering in winter  .
the thickness is on point, but the length came up short. I was constantly pulling it down.
It’s amazing I bought more collars

I got this top to wear under a puffer vest and it complements it really well. The fabric is soft and stretchy with a form-fitting silhouette. It’s thicker and warmed than expected, and feels good quality. It’s perfect for traveling or wearing in the fall.
I will be ordering more colors of this shirt. Quality is amazing. Fabric is soft and buttery. Fits true to size. Love it!
I wear layers in the winter and prefer cotton shirts. This is a nice thick material and very soft. I highly recommend and have purchased a few of them.
I don't normally write reviews but I have to say I am extemely impressed with the quality, weight and softness of this shirt.  Great price also.
This is a crop top. Completely misleading. Will be returning.

评论概述: Nice material, not a true to size.

I am returning it because it was big for a size small and there were no holes for the thumbs as it was shown in the pictures. Material feels pretty good though.
It's ver soft and cozy but it's thicker than it looks so it's better for a chillier day.
Very soft fabric and is as pictured. Fits snuggly. I love the way it feels.

评论概述: Great thick soft staple.  Pick up a few

评论概述: Too thick and weird thumb holes
评论详情: This top is very thick.  I thought it was just going to be a higher quality, long sleeve t-shirt based on reviews, but it is a fall weather top.  I didn't notice that the description said thumb holes.  How weird.  They need to make that part of the description more prominent in case you don't want to look like you're wearing some nerdy activewear shirt.  I was looking for an off-white or white shirt to be a basic wardrobe staple, not something to stick my thumbs through in cold weather.  Also, take note that sizing seems accurate.  Although I am usually a small,  I sized up to a medium because I wanted a more relaxed fit, but it sits ever so slightly off my shoulders, just the way a medium would.

I recently ordered this Long Sleeve Crew Neck and couldn't be more pleased! The fit is perfect and true to size, making it incredibly comfortable to wear. The fabric is soft against the skin and feels great for all-day wear. It's versatile enough to dress up or down, and the quality seems excellent. I highly recommend this shirt for anyone looking for a reliable and stylish wardrobe staple.
I absolutely lovee this shade of green! What I don’t like is how thick this shirt is. It’s definitely for winter.
Long sleeve women’s top. Stretchy. Comfortable to wear. Well made. Sizing is accurate. Good quality for the cost

This is a super soft stretchy top with super long sleeves, which I love. The fabric is thin and breathable without being transparent. It isn't particularly warm but looks nice when layered with other things as it's fairly fitted.

评论概述: Comfortable and stretchy for a great fit
评论详情: The thickness of the soft material is perfect for all but the hottest seasons, the stretchiest od the material provides a great, comfortable fit.

评论概述: Nice! More Autumn Weight than Summer.
评论详情: What a nice quality thumbhole top for cooler weather! Soft and nicely made. The stitching around hems is just about perfect, reinforced around the thumbs. Brilliant !  Finally! Longer sleeves! Cozy!  Great length! Shorter but not cropped, maybe just past a natural waistband. The medium is good to loose on a 5’2” -ish,125-30 pounder :D Doesn’t cling to the lumps and even fits droopy arms without accentuating them. Yay! Is not fitted but not oversized either. Goldilocks would call it “just right.”  The crew neck is just about right - could be a little more scooped. Looks very much like the one in the item description, on the model, except the color in that picture is more cream than the beige in the photos I included.  The fabric is a brushed jersey, heavier than expected, but not stiff. The inside is smooth and very comfortable. Almost silky. Probably ok for summer nights?  Nice tag from the company dangles at the collar making it look very giftable. Thank you!
Received item fast but didn't care for the material. It was thick and wasn't stretchy as I would have thought.  Fit was a bit tight all around...

The fabric of this top is quite heavy. It is also definitely slim fit. I sized up and it fits okay, except that I would prefer it to be longer. I think it would work better as a base layer for cold weather gear. I am always a fan of thumbholes and this top has them. The title tries to cover all the bases, but this top is not appropriate for summer or going out in my opinion!

I think my favorite thing about this shirt is that it has finger holes in the sleeves. This is great because sometimes long sleeves can be too short. I did size up for this (normally an L, ordered an XL), and it ended up being a perfect fit, since I don't like my clothes way too tight. All in all, this shirt is nice and comfortable. I would certainly recommend it.
This shirt is very soft and comfortable. The fabric is stretchy and moves well with the body. The sleeves are a little long, and the body a little short.

This casual top fits a little snug, and the material is a little stiff, so I would recommend ordering a size up from what you normally wear. With that being said, I love the length of the sleeves. They are long enough to go past my wrists and I can use the thumb holes if I need to.  Overall, I would rate this 4 out of 5 stars.

评论概述: Nice, comfortable, versatile long sleeve shirt👚
评论详情: I'm a big fan of long sleeved shirts so I got the BTFBM Women's Casual Tops Summer Fall 2024 Long Sleeve Crew Neck Workout Stretchy Slim Fit Basic Y2K Going Out Shirt, and I’m really impressed with it.  Firstly, the material is stretchy and comfortable, making it perfect for both casual wear and workouts. The slim fit design accentuates your figure nicely without feeling too tight. The crew neck and long sleeves are great for transitioning between summer and fall, providing just the right amount of coverage.  The Y2K style gives it a trendy, nostalgic vibe that’s perfect for going out. It pairs well with jeans, shorts, or even a skirt, making it a versatile addition to your wardrobe.  In conclusion, this top is a fantastic blend of comfort, style, and versatility. Whether you're heading to the gym, running errands, or going out with friends, this shirt is a great choice. Highly recommended!

This is a tad bit on the short side but not as low as a crop top. I love the stretchy fabric. It fits great. My favorite part are the sleeves that are long and offer thumb holes. I really love the softness and this isn't see through like others. Def recommend.

This is a comfortable shirt, great for lounging around on a fall day. I felt like it washed well and had a good amount of stretch to it. The price was fair at $15. This would be a great travel shirt shirt because it can be tucked in for a more business casual look, but also super comfortable. I'm sure I will get a lot of use out of it.
Love this top.  Nice quality, soft fabric and has a good weight to it.  It does run small however, as a slim fit, so size up if you like it to be a little looser.

I'm 5'5", 120lbs and normally wear a small but based on the size chart I ordered a Medium and glad I did.  Even though I intend to wear this as a base layer under a jacket or cardigan, I didn't want it shin tight.  The fabric is very nice and more substantial than most.  I expect that is because it has cotton but there is still plenty of stretch.  The coffee color isn't quite as dark as it appears on my screen but I'm fine with it. I have not yet washed it but if it pills or shrinks I will come back and update this review.

Long sleeves with a high neckline. The shirt was better quality than I expected. It has good thickness and is made of a soft quality material that looks like it will last. Color pops nicely and has a cotton like feel to the material. Its a shirt that's not too tight or loose but has a nice form fitted style- will lay nicely on the body. Goes with anything, is versatile and has a classic look. Good buy if you're looking for a nice shirt for all seasons.

评论概述: I Love How Flattering and Versatile This Top Is!
评论详情: This BTFBM top is a wardrobe staple! The brick red color is so vibrant, and the slim fit is very flattering. The stretchy fabric is comfortable and moves with me, whether I'm working out or going out. I love that I can dress it up or down, depending on the occasion. I highly recommend this top to anyone looking for a stylish and versatile addition to their wardrobe.

I ordered a small in this top because that's the size I wear in just about every top out there. If I had taken a closer look at the size chart, which I thought I did, I would have realized that I should have ordered a large! Other than that, this is a nice soft and stretchy top. The fabric is is thicker than regular t-shirt material, so I feel like it will keep me warmer than most. It is a little on the short side for my taste. It still goes down to my waistline, but I prefer longer tops when it comes to long sleeves.

This is a quality shirt. The fabric is thick. It feels like a nice shirt. The sleeves do have thumb holes. It is shorter in length- like the early 2000's style was. Found the size chart to be accurate. Go larger for looser look.

So, this shirt is made of a thick, soft fabric and would make an AWESOME layering piece for the fall! I could even tell on the hanger that this shirt (especially the material plus the long sleeves, you can forget about it) is going to be waaaay too warm for the summer - especially if you live anywhere in the SE right now. Good material, decent shirt (although simple), just not for summer.

评论概述: Nice shirt, but the white is kind of see-through and conflicting info on shirt tag.
评论详情: I deducted one star for this BTFBM long sleeve crew neck shirt due to the fabric being somewhat see-through, especially when stretched (and also because they don't offer an XXL size).  I chose the white color though so I can't say anything about the darker colors.The fabric of this shirt is decent.  It feels slightly thicker than the really cheap shirts out there and it's also stretchy and soft enough for my sensitive skin.  It's not scratchy or stiff.  This will be great as a base for layering in the cooler months.I like the thumb holes at the sleeve ends.  I always like thumb holes for somewhat protecting my hands from germy surfaces and/or somewhat protecting from the sun.  Plus, I just like the look.I chose the XL size for my 38C chest and my 34" waist, even though their size chart has XL at a 37.1" chest and the waist at 32.48".  I'm happy to report that the XL fits me nicely though if it shrinks in the wash, then it might be a little too snug.  But right now, it's almost perfect.  It doesn't hug my gut too much, the sleeves aren't too loose or tight and there's enough room for my chest, though it does get slightly snug across there when I spread my arms but it's not enough to be uncomfortable at all.  The inside tag in the shirt has conflicting info.  It says 'tumble dry low' but it also has the 'do not tumble dry' laundry symbol at the bottom of the tag so . . . that's irritating.  The shirt does have 31% cotton in it so it's probably best to not tumble dry it.I like the hem length.  This shirt isn't a hideous crop top but it's not too long, either.  I'm 5'5" though so the shirt will be shorter on longer torsos or taller peeps, and longer on the peeps shorter than I.Overall, it's a nice shirt and I like it except for the see-through factor.  That bugs me.

评论概述: Nice top, feels great but size chart is off
评论详情: I just love the color and the fabric of this top!  The fabric is a sort of stretch cashmere, and very soft to the skin with a good stretch, the "brick red" is mre of a cross between terra cotta and pumpkin, but really nice.  The problem is the sizing, the chart is really off, I normally wear a large, but really need to have an extra large, to get a fit close to that shown on the model, otherwise, especially considering the reasonable price, this is a big yes.

评论概述: Stretchy, soft cotton blend knit shirt
评论详情: Glad I got a medium in this shirt as it's a slim fit. Mid-weight quality fabric with a good amount of stretch. The crew neck is not too low and the sleeves fit great. There's a thumb hole at the end of the sleeve for extra hand protection if you're outside in the sun, or just want to cover your hand. Comes in an array of bright and neutral colors for you to chose from. Great for upcoming fall weather to layer under a jacket or sweater or wear on it's own with jeans.
This is comfortable and easy to wear. It is very basic, but exactly what I was looking for. Love the holes in the sleeves. Length is perfect. Cause the laundry without shrinking.

This reminds me of the Aritzia long sleeves! I will say, the arms are a bit long but they don’t look tacky when bunched up a bit. The material is a wonderful thickness. I bought this in black, navy blue and white. I haven’t worn the white yet but can’t anticipate it being see through which is great.
